channel.title: Shop help
channel.description: When I edited Cassie's Shield Shop with items I ran the server and the shop was blank. What should I do to get it back.

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @superbum1 superbum1
item.description:
@superbum1 wrote:

i give example

[code]shop = 3 Falador_General_Store 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5[code/]

make sure to use tabs not spaces[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Not sure on this, but go back and see if all the Id’s and ammounts are spaced apart with a “Tab”. That might help, or if that doesn’t work, just download the source again > Copy the that line in the Shop.cfg and paste it to the current one.

Hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

make sure you hit tab and not space bar, if you edited the shop.cfg it doesnt need compiling and will not show a error in compiles, so double check it, also make sure you didnt press space after a item amount or id!

Read full topic
